prompts.title: Write Technical Documentation for {{software_product}}
prompts.content: Create comprehensive technical documentation for {{software_product}}, including system architecture, API references, and deployment guides. Focus on {{specific_aspect}} and ensure it's suitable for {{target_audience}}.
prompts.description: Generates detailed technical documentation for software products

variables.name: specific_aspect
variables.description: Particular feature or component to focus on

variables.name: target_audience
variables.description: The intended readers of the documentation

prompts.title: Create a Cybersecurity Incident Response Plan
prompts.content: Develop a detailed incident response plan for {{organization_type}} to address {{security_threat_type}}. Include detection, containment, eradication, and recovery procedures.

variables.name: organization_type
variables.description: Type of organization the plan is for

variables.name: security_threat_type
variables.description: Type of security threat to address

prompts.title: Design System Architecture for {{application_type}}
prompts.content: Create a detailed system architecture design for {{application_type}}, considering {{scalability_requirements}} and {{performance_needs}}. Include component diagrams and infrastructure specifications.

prompts.title: Develop AI Model Training Guidelines
prompts.content: Create guidelines for training {{ai_model_type}} models, including data preparation, model selection, hyperparameter tuning, and evaluation metrics for {{specific_use_case}}.

variables.name: specific_use_case
variables.description: Specific application of the AI model

prompts.title: Create Cloud Migration Strategy
prompts.content: Develop a comprehensive cloud migration strategy for {{current_infrastructure}} to {{target_cloud_platform}}, considering {{migration_priorities}}.

prompts.title: Write API Documentation for {{api_service}}
prompts.content: Create detailed API documentation for {{api_service}}, including endpoints, request/response formats, authentication methods, and example usage for {{primary_use_case}}.

variables.name: primary_use_case
variables.description: Main use case of the API

prompts.title: Create DevOps Pipeline Documentation
prompts.content: Document the CI/CD pipeline for {{project_type}}, including {{build_tools}} configuration, testing procedures, and deployment strategies to {{deployment_environment}}.

prompts.title: Develop Database Schema Documentation
prompts.content: Create comprehensive documentation for {{database_type}} schema, including table structures, relationships, indexes, and optimization strategies for {{data_requirements}}.

prompts.title: Create IoT Device Integration Guide
prompts.content: Develop an integration guide for {{iot_device}} with {{platform}}, including setup procedures, communication protocols, and data handling for {{use_case}}.

prompts.title: Write Blockchain Smart Contract Documentation
prompts.content: Create documentation for smart contracts on {{blockchain_platform}}, including contract functions, security considerations, and deployment procedures for {{contract_purpose}}.
